thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 03 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Strong Equity Markets Boost U.S. Life Insurers' 2017 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Strong Equity Markets Boost U.S. Life Insurers' 2017 Results

organizations.name: strong equity markets boost u.s. life insurers

text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Fitch:‍
* FITCH SAYS STRONG EQUITY MARKETS, FAVORABLE UNDERWRITING PERFORMANCE LED TO IMPROVED PROFITABILITY FOR MAJORITY OF U.S. LIFE INSURERS IN 2017
* ‍FITCH SAYS EXPECTS LESS FAVORABLE EQUITY MARKETS, FURTHER SPREAD COMPRESSION TO LEAD TO SOMEWHAT LOWER RESULTS IN 2018 FOR U.S. LIFE INSURERS
* FITCH SAYS CREDIT-RELATED INVESTMENT LOSSES FOR U.S. LIFE INSURERS ARE EXPECTED TO INCREASE MODESTLY IN 2018, BUT REMAIN BELOW LONG-TERM AVERAGES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: [ ]
